questions.question: 1. What is the primary function of the Power Management Unit (PMU) in a drone?

answers.b: To manage and distribute power to drone components

questions.question: 2. What is the first step to diagnose a battery issue in a drone?

answers.b: Inspect the battery voltage and charge level

questions.question: 3. Why is it important to inspect soldering points during drone maintenance?
4. What safety precaution should you take before handling a drone battery?

answers.c: Disconnect the battery and power off the drone
answers.d: Keep the battery connected to avoid resetting the system
